category.title: Standards and Certifications Providers
category.description: Entities that can test GVCS tools for adherence to OSE Specifications. Certifications, such as Factor e Certified, may be given to other producers after verifying their capacity to produce according to OSE Specifications. The OSE Label is the mark of adherence to OSE's standards.
